David Cameron is said to be so worried about the prospect of losing legislation in a parliamentary logjam that he held a series of meetings with MPs and peers last week described as a`` charm offensive''. The Prime Minister is definitely in listening mode as never before, said one Conservative MP.`` He is much more conciliatory, the mood music has completely changed.''
